languages.text: {n}Несколько мгновений Идира борется с рыданиями, рвущимися из ее горла. Наконец, кое-как вытерев лицо, она выпрямляется и бросает на вас желчный взгляд.{/n} "Ну, ваша взяла... Лорд-капитан. Раз уж помереть от старости мне не суждено, то и оставаться здесь мне незачем. Я с вами".

{n}She takes a few moments to fight back the sobs welling up in her throat. Then she quickly wipes her face, straightens, and gives you a spiteful look.{/n} "You win... Lord Captain. Since dying of old age is off the table now, there's no point in me hanging around here. I'm going with you."
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько мгновений Идира борется с рыданиями, рвущимися из ее горла. Наконец, кое-как вытерев лицо, она выпрямляется и бросает на вас желчный взгляд.{/n} "Ну, ваша взяла... Лорд-капитан. Раз уж помереть от старости мне не суждено, то и оставаться здесь мне незачем. Я с вами".

traits.locale_text: {n}She takes a few moments to fight back the sobs welling up in her throat. Then she quickly wipes her face, straightens, and gives you a spiteful look.{/n} "You win... Lord Captain. Since dying of old age is off the table now, there's no point in me staying here any longer. I'm going with you."

{n}She takes a few moments to fight back the sobs welling up in her throat. Then she quickly wipes her face, straightens, and gives you a spiteful look.{/n} "You win... Lord Captain. Since dying of old age is off the table now, there's no point in me hanging around here. I'm going with you."

{n}She takes a few moments to fight back the sobs welling up in her throat. Then she quickly wipes her face, straightens, and gives you a spiteful look.{/n} "You win... Lord Captain. Since dying of old age is off the table now, there's no point in me hanging around here. I'm going with you."

languages.text: {n}彼女は喉から湧き上がる嗚咽をこらえるのに少し時間がかかった。そしてすぐに顔を拭き、背筋を伸ばし、悪意に満ちた視線をあなたに向ける。{/n}「あなたの勝ちよ…ロード・キャプテン。老衰で死ぬことはもうないんだから、これ以上ここにいても意味がないわ。あなたと一緒に行く」
languages.original_text: {n}She takes a few moments to fight back the sobs welling up in her throat. Then she quickly wipes her face, straightens, and gives you a spiteful look.{/n} "You win... Lord Captain. Since dying of old age is off the table now, there's no point in me hanging around here. I'm going with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は喉から湧き上がる嗚咽をこらえるのに少し時間がかかった。そしてすぐに顔を拭き、背筋を伸ばし、悪意に満ちた視線をあなたに向ける。{/n}「あなたの勝ちよ…ロード・キャプテン。老衰で死ぬことはもうないんだから、これ以上ここにいても意味がないわ。あなたと一緒に行く」

languages.text: {n}她花了很长时间，才勉强抑制中喉中的抽泣声。随后，她迅速擦了擦脸，挺直身子，怨毒地看了你一眼。{/n}“算你赢了……舰长大人。既然我已经没办法在这里慢慢老死，继续留在这里也没有意义了。我要和你一起走。”
languages.original_text: {n}She takes a few moments to fight back the sobs welling up in her throat. Then she quickly wipes her face, straightens, and gives you a spiteful look.{/n} "You win... Lord Captain. Since dying of old age is off the table now, there's no point in me hanging around here. I'm going with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}她花了很长时间，才勉强抑制中喉中的抽泣声。随后，她迅速擦了擦脸，挺直身子，怨毒地看了你一眼。{/n}“算你赢了……舰长大人。既然我已经没办法在这里慢慢老死，继续呆下去也没有意义了。我要和你一起走。”

languages.text: {n}Tarda unos segundos en sobreponerse a los sollozos que le brotan de la garganta. Luego se limpia rápidamente la cara, se endereza y te lanza una mirada rencorosa.{/n} «Usted gana... Lord Capitán. Ya que no voy a morir de vieja, no tiene sentido seguir aquí. Voy con usted».
languages.original_text: {n}She takes a few moments to fight back the sobs welling up in her throat. Then she quickly wipes her face, straightens, and gives you a spiteful look.{/n} "You win... Lord Captain. Since dying of old age is off the table now, there's no point in me hanging around here. I'm going with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tarda unos segundos en sobreponerse a los sollozos que le brotan de la garganta. Luego se limpia rápidamente la cara, se endereza y te lanza una mirada rencorosa.{/n} «Usted gana... Lord Capitán. Ya que no voy a morir de vieja, no tiene sentido permanecer aquí por más tiempo. Voy con usted».

languages.text: {n}Sie kämpft einige Augenblicke gegen das Schluchzen an, das auf ihrer Kehle aufsteigen will. Dann wischt sie sich schnell übers Gesicht, richtet sich auf und blickt dich verächtlich an.{/n} "Ihr habt gewonnen ... Lord Captain. Da es ja nun vom Tisch ist, dass ich eines Tages an Altersschwäche sterbe, macht es keinen Sinn, hier zu bleiben. Ich komme mit Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}She takes a few moments to fight back the sobs welling up in her throat. Then she quickly wipes her face, straightens, and gives you a spiteful look.{/n} "You win... Lord Captain. Since dying of old age is off the table now, there's no point in me hanging around here. I'm going with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie kämpft einige Augenblicke gegen das Schluchzen an, das auf ihrer Kehle aufsteigen will. Dann wischt sie sich schnell übers Gesicht, richtet sich auf und blickt dich verächtlich an.{/n} "Ihr habt gewonnen ... Lord Captain. Da es ja nun vom Tisch ist, dass ich mal an Altersschwäche sterbe, ist es auch zwecklos, noch länger hier zu bleiben. Ich komme mit Euch."

languages.text: {n}Elle retient les sanglots qui lui montent dans la gorge. Une fois calmée, elle s'essuie le visage, se redresse et vous jette un regard méchant.{/n} « Vous avez gagné... {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Puisque je ne peux plus espérer mourir de vieillesse, je n'ai aucune raison de rester ici plus longtemps. Je viens avec vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}She takes a few moments to fight back the sobs welling up in her throat. Then she quickly wipes her face, straightens, and gives you a spiteful look.{/n} "You win... Lord Captain. Since dying of old age is off the table now, there's no point in me hanging around here. I'm going with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle retient les sanglots qui lui montent dans la gorge. Une fois calmée, elle s'essuie le visage, se redresse et vous jette un regard méchant.{/n} « Vous avez gagné... {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Puisque je ne peux plus espérer mourir de vieillesse, je n'ai aucune raison de rester ici plus longtemps. Je viens avec vous. »

languages.text: {n}İdira biraz durup boğazında düğümlenen hıçkırıklara direniyor. Ardından hızlıca yüzünü silip doğrularak sana kindar bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Sen kazandın... Lord Kaptan. Artık yaşlanarak ölmek gibi bir seçeneğim olmadığına göre burada kalmamın da bir anlamı yok. Seninle geliyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}She takes a few moments to fight back the sobs welling up in her throat. Then she quickly wipes her face, straightens, and gives you a spiteful look.{/n} "You win... Lord Captain. Since dying of old age is off the table now, there's no point in me hanging around here. I'm going with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira biraz durup boğazında düğümlenen hıçkırıklara direniyor. Ardından hızlıca yüzünü silip doğrularak sana kindar bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Sen kazandın... Lord Kaptan. Artık yaşlanarak ölmek gibi bir seçeneğim olmadığına göre burada kalmamın da bir anlamı yok. Seninle geliyorum."
